text: Ilana Rose Glazer (born April 12, 1987) is an American comedian, director, producer, writer, and actress. She co-created and co-starred, with Abbi Jacobson, the Comedy Central series Broad City. She was twice nominated for the Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actress in a Comedy Series for the series. Glazer also starred in the 2017 movie Rough Night. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:Comedians from New York (state) Category:Writers from New York (state)
title: Ilana Glazer
